name: Paint Game Ver 0.0.0.1
description:
Important Note: Unfortunately the game is currently at an unplayable state. An update will be made once the jam is over.

Paint your way in this hectic WarioWare-esque game!

You will be given references, paint then as best as you can. Simple? Here's the catch, your brushes have obtuse defects and you only have 10 seconds to deliver.

Good luck!
